overview: From the hilarious mind of comedian, multi-hyphenate entertainer and internet sensation Affion Crockett (The Wedding Ringer, Pixels, A Haunted House), “Mirror II Society” marks the first long-form special from the accomplished actor, writer, dancer, rapper, and comedian, offering a relentless barrage of jokes and physical humor as he dives into his hilarious experiences growing up as a dancer, coming to grips with getting older, relationships, politics and much more.
title: Affion Crockett: Mirror II Society
